posts.title: Robotic Cracks and Fissure Detection System
posts.description: Led a team of 5 to build a system that detects internal cracks and fissures in the walls using a thermal infrared camera and an ultrasonic sensor mounted on a drone.
posts.excerpt:
• Led a team of 5 to build a system that detects internal cracks and fissures in the walls using a thermal infrared camera and an ultrasonic sensor mounted on a drone.
  • This project was done as a part of a national level competition (IICDC). Technologies used: Energia IDE, CC3200-LaunchXL MCU.
  •  Reached the quarter final stages and finished in top 96.3% among the 10,146 teams participating
posts.content:
• Led a team of 5 to build a system that detects internal cracks and fissures in the walls using a thermal infrared camera and an ultrasonic sensor mounted on a drone.
  • This project was done as a part of a national level competition (IICDC). Technologies used: Energia IDE, CC3200-LaunchXL MCU.
  •  Reached the quarter final stages and finished in top 96.3% among the 10,146 teams participating

posts.title: Nora Voice Assistant
posts.description: Oversaw a team of 4 to develop a Java based voice assistant android application for the visually impaired that provided them with basic cell phone features such as calling, SMS, emergency, location, notes and music.
posts.excerpt: Oversaw a team of 4 to develop a Java based voice assistant android application for the visually impaired that provided them with basic cell phone features such as calling, SMS, emergency, location, notes and music.
posts.content: Oversaw a team of 4 to develop a Java based voice assistant android application for the visually impaired that provided them with basic cell phone features such as calling, SMS, emergency, location, notes and music.

posts.title: Nora Web Application
posts.description: Utilized Decision Tree to implement a Machine Learning solution to detect and prevent mental issues such as depression.
posts.excerpt: Utilized Decision Tree to implement a Machine Learning solution to detect and prevent mental issues such as depression.
posts.content: Utilized Decision Tree to implement a Machine Learning solution to detect and prevent mental issues such as depression.

posts.title: Handwriting Recognition
posts.description: Designed a CNN model to recognize handwritten text and convert it into a .pdf, .txt file. Achieved 90% accuracy on train dataset.
posts.excerpt: Designed a CNN model to recognize handwritten text and convert it into a .pdf, .txt file. Achieved 90% accuracy on train dataset.
posts.content: Designed a CNN model to recognize handwritten text and convert it into a .pdf, .txt file. Achieved 90% accuracy on train dataset.

posts.title: ACL Tear Detection by analyzing MRI Scans
posts.description: Led a team of 3 to design and implement a Deep Learning architecture to analyze digital knee MRI scans and predict if there is an ACL tear. Achieved an accuracy of 90.8% on test dataset.
posts.excerpt:
• Led a team of 3 to design and implement a Deep Learning architecture to analyze digital knee MRI scans and predict if there is an ACL tear.
  • Achieved an accuracy of 90.8% on test dataset.
posts.content:
• Led a team of 3 to design and implement a Deep Learning architecture to analyze digital knee MRI scans and predict if there is an ACL tear.
  • Achieved an accuracy of 90.8% on test dataset.

content_blocks.content_html: I grew up in a generation wherein computer science and its applications in information technology emerged as the greatest socio-economic enabler. On one hand, entrepreneurs created tech firms that employed thousands of employees worldwide. On the other hand, smaller firms that emerged as ancillary support or as secondary and tertiary consumers of these services, generated massive employment in both organized and unorganized sector. India’s transition from an agriculture-based economy to a services-based economy was well in motion when I was born. But all of this had a deep personal relevance. My father, an IT engineer from a not very well-known college, struggled with jobs for most of his early career, working with multiple small and medium sized firms. I believe the only reason he could remain employed and feed his family was his background in IT. He has worked incredibly hard to provide a decent life to his family and the best possible education to his children. My motivation to pursue a graduate degree in  computer science and a career in this field therefore is a part of a personal experiences-driven ambition – to contribute my bit to the upcoming computer science industry. I'm currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science from the University of San Francisco.

content_blocks.title: Certifications
content_blocks.description: Having a profound interest in developing solutions to real world problems and using Machine Learning in every possible manner, these courses helped me set my base strong.

content_blocks.title: Hi there, I am Joel Konuparamban
content_blocks.description_html: A tech enthusiast and a problem solver from San Francisco. I'm a MS candidate, specializing in Computer Science. My areas of interest include Software Development, Big Data, Machine Learning, Deep Learning. Having done a number of projects during my undergrad, I'm well versed with the basics of these fields. I have my strengths at logical reasoning, solving quantitative problems, and general problem solving.
